blocks.name: elmptrab
blocks.content: Membership in a one-parameter class of sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, c5, w1)))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c5, c4))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c5, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0)), diffsc(s1, c6))
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0), wcel(c2, c3))
  mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, crab(s1, c5, w1))
  simp1(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0)
  3bitrd(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))), wa(wcel(c0, c4), w0))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))), wcel(c2, c3))
  fvmpt3(hs1, c2, c3, c1, crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))), crab(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))), universe)
  rabeqbidv(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), csb(s0, c2, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs1), c2, c5)
  dfsbcq(s0, cv(hs1), c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(hs1, c3, crab(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))), cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, c5, w1)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs1, c3, crab(s1, c5, w1), crab(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))))
  nfcv(hs1, crab(s1, c5, w1))
  nfrab(s0, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))
  syl6eqr(crab(s1, c5, w1), crab(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))), crab(s1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  rabeqbidv(s1, c5, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), w1, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs1), w1)
  cbvrab(hs0, s1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  nfcv(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5))
  nfcv(s1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5))
  nfsbc(s1, s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs1))
  nfsbc1v(s1, cv(hs0), w1)
  nfv(hs0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  syl6rbbr(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1)))
  equcoms(hs0, s1, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))))
  sbceq1a(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  sbccom(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs0), w1)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(crab(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))), universe), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6))
  chvar(s0, hs1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c5, c6)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs1), c5)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c5, c6), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6))
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c3)
  eleq1d(c5, c6, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs1), c5)
  rabexg(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5), c6, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))
  3bitrd(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))), wa(wcel(c0, c4), w0), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c5)), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1))), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1))))
  a1i(wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c0, crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)))), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c5)), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1)))))
  elrab(hs0, c0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1)), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1)))
  sbcbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))
  dfsbcq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, w1)
  anbi1d(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c5)), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1)), wcel(c0, c4))
  eleq2d(c0, csb(s0, c2, c5), c4, wcel(c2, c3))
  csbiegf(s0, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, wcel(c2, c3))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1)), w0)
  sbc2iegf(s0, s1, c2, c3, c0, c4, w1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, c4))
  baibr(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c4), w0), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0))
  3anass(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4), w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, csb(s0, c2, c5), wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w1))))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c5))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c2, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s1, c5, w1))
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(hs1), c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c2, wsbc(s1, c0, w1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c4)

thm elmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 })
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c2 ‚àß s1 = c0)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c5 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0)), d(s1, c6))
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0), c2 ‚àà c3)
  mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, { s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 })
  simp1(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4, w0)
  3bitrd(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0), c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0))
  eleq2d(c0, (c1 ` c2), { hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, c2 ‚àà c3)
  fvmpt3(hs1, c2, c3, c1, { hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, { hs0 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, universe)
  rabeqbidv(hs0, [hs1 / s0]c5, [c2 / s0]c5, hs1 = c2, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1, [c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs1, c2, c5)
  dfsbcq(s0, hs1, c2, [hs0 / s1]w1)
  eqtri(c1, (hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { hs0 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 }))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs1, c3, { s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 }, { hs0 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 })
  nfcv(hs1, { s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 })
  nfrab(s0, hs0, [hs1 / s0]c5, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1)
  nfsbc1v(s0, hs1, [hs0 / s1]w1)
  syl6eqr({ s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 }, { hs0 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, { s1 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0]w1 }, s0 = hs1)
  rabeqbidv(s1, c5, [hs1 / s0]c5, s0 = hs1, w1, [hs1 / s0]w1)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs1, w1)
  cbvrab(hs0, s1, [hs1 / s0]c5, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1, [hs1 / s0]w1)
  nfcv(hs0, [hs1 / s0]c5)
  nfcv(s1, [hs1 / s0]c5)
  nfsbc(s1, s0, hs1, [hs0 / s1]w1)
  nfcv(s1, hs1)
  nfsbc1v(s1, hs0, w1)
  nfv(hs0, [hs1 / s0]w1)
  syl6rbbr(hs0 = s1, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1, [hs1 / s0]w1, [hs0 / s1][hs1 / s0]w1)
  equcoms(hs0, s1, ([hs1 / s0]w1 ‚Üî[hs0 / s1][hs1 / s0]w1))
  sbceq1a(s1, hs0, [hs1 / s0]w1)
  sbccom(s0, s1, hs1, hs0, w1)
  syl(hs1 ‚àà c3, { hs0 ‚àà[hs1 / s0]c5 |[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 } ‚àà ùïå, [hs1 / s0]c5 ‚àà c6)
  chvar(s0, hs1, (hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí[hs1 / s0]c5 ‚àà c6), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6))
  nfim(s0, hs1 ‚àà c3, [hs1 / s0]c5 ‚àà c6)
  nfv(s0, hs1 ‚àà c3)
  nfel1(s0, [hs1 / s0]c5, c6)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs1, c5)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs1, s0 ‚àà c3, c5 ‚àà c6, hs1 ‚àà c3, [hs1 / s0]c5 ‚àà c6)
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c3)
  eleq1d(c5, c6, [hs1 / s0]c5, s0 = hs1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs1, c5)
  rabexg(hs0, [hs1 / s0]c5, c6, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1)
  3bitrd(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 }, (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0), (c0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 ‚àß[c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1), (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß[c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1))
  a1i(c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 } ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 ‚àß[c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1)))
  elrab(hs0, c0, [c2 / s0]c5, [c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1, [c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1)
  sbcbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c0, [hs0 / s1]w1, [c0 / s1]w1)
  dfsbcq(s1, hs0, c0, w1)
  anbi1d(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5, [c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1, c0 ‚àà c4)
  eleq2d(c0, [c2 / s0]c5, c4, c2 ‚àà c3)
  csbiegf(s0, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, c2 ‚àà c3)
  pm5.32da(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4, [c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1, w0)
  sbc2iegf(s0, s1, c2, c3, c0, c4, w1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, c0 ‚àà c4)
  baibr(c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß w0))
  3anass(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c4, w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà[c2 / s0]c5 |[c2 / s0][hs0 / s1]w1 })
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c([hs1 / s0]c5)
  diff.hs0.c([c2 / s0]c5)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s1 ‚àà c5 | w1 })
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, hs1, c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([hs1 / s0]w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c2 / s0][c0 / s1]w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c4)
}

blocks.name: elmptrab2
blocks.content: Membership in a one-parameter class of sets, indexed by arbitrary base sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 26-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmptrab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, c4, w1)))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0)), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0)), diffsc(s1, c5))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c3), w0))
  elmptrab(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, universe, c3, c4, universe, w0, w1)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  impbii(w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c3), w0), wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0))
  3simpc(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c3), w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  elexd(c2, c5, wcel(c0, c3))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm elmptrab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß w0))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c4 | w1 })
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c2 ‚àß s1 = c0)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c4 = c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

blocks.name: isfbas
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a filter base." Note that some authors require filter bases to be closed under pairwise intersections, but that is not necessary under our definition. One advantage of this definition is that tails in a directed set form a filter base under our meaning. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c0)), wa(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), emptycls))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  anbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cpw(cpw(c0))), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), emptycls)))), wss(c2, cpw(c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(cpw(c0))), wss(c2, cpw(c0))), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

  neeq1(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls)

  syl(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c0 ‚ãÇ P((hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))‚â† ‚àÖ))))), c1 ‚àà dom(fBas))

thm isfbas2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c0)), wa(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))

  isfbas(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  anbi2i(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), emptycls)))), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))

  2ralbii(s0, s1, c2, c2, wne(cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), emptycls), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3bitr4i(wne(cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), emptycls), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  exbii(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s2), cin(c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  elin(cv(s2), c2, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  selpw(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  isfbas(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)

  exbii(s2, s2 ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÇ P((s0 ‚ãÇ s1))), (s2 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)))
  bitri(s2 ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÇ P((s0 ‚ãÇ s1))), (s2 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)), (s2 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚àà P((s0 ‚ãÇ s1))))
  elin(s2, c2, P((s0 ‚ãÇ s1)))

blocks.name: fbasssin
blocks.content: A filter base contains subsets of its pairwise intersections. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2010.)

thm fbasssin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3))))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))

  simprd(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  isfbas2(hs0, hs1, s0, c1, cdm(cfbas), c0)

  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(hs1))))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(hs1))), wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3)))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(hs1)), cin(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  ineq2(cv(hs1), c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)

thm fbasssin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  syl5com(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))))
  simp3d(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0)
  simprd(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1))))), c0 ‚äÜ P(c1))
  ibi(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1))))))), c1 ‚àà dom(fBas))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  isfbas2(hs0, hs1, s0, c1, dom(fBas), c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ hs1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, s0 ‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1), s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ hs1))
  sseq2d(s0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1), (c2 ‚ãÇ hs1), hs0 = c2)
  ineq1(hs0, c2, hs1)
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = c3, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ hs1), s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3))
  sseq2d(s0, (c2 ‚ãÇ hs1), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3), hs1 = c3)
  ineq2(hs1, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fbssint
blocks.content: A filter base contains subsets of its finite intersections. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fbssint(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dne(c2, emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wi(wceq(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2)))))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), universe)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), universe)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  fbasne0(c0, c1)
  n0(s0, c0)
  sylibr(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), universe)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), universe))))
  eximi(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), universe)))
  jctr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), universe))
  ssv(cv(s0))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), universe))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(c2, emptycls), wss(cv(s0), cint(c2)), wss(cv(s0), universe))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cint(c2), universe, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cint(c2), universe, cint(emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  inteq(c2, emptycls)
  int0()
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wne(c2, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cint(c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cint(c2), cfv(cfi, c0)))
  syl13anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wne(c2, emptycls)), wcel(cint(c2), cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wne(c2, emptycls))

blocks.name: fbncp
blocks.content: A filter base does not contain complements of its elements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c3, c2), c0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, cdif(c3, c2)))))
  fbasssin(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cdif(c3, c2))
  rexlimiva(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, cdif(c3, c2))), wcel(emptycls, c0))

  sylbi(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, cdif(c3, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sseq2i(cv(hs0), cin(c2, cdif(c3, c2)), emptycls)
  disjdif(c2, c3)
  ss0(cv(hs0))
  biimpac(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: opnfbas
blocks.content: The collection of open supersets of a nonempty set in a topology is a neighborhoods of the set, one of the motivations for the filter concept. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: trfbas
blocks.content: Conditions for the trace of a filter base ` F ` to be a filter base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm trfbas(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls)), wn(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c2))))
  trfbas2(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls)), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2)))))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssexg(c2, c1, cdm(cfbas))
  elrest(s0, c0, cfv(cfbas, c1), c2, universe, emptycls)
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls)), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2)))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2)))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wn(wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2))))
  nesym(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls)
  ralnex(s0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  trfbas2(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bbr((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  notbid((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚àÖ ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (‚àÖ ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2))), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà dom(fBas))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  ancoms(c1 ‚àà dom(fBas), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexg(c2, c1, dom(fBas))
  elrest(s0, c0, (fBas ` c1), c2, universe, emptycls)
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, (s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, ¬¨ ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2))
  nesym((s0 ‚ãÇ c2), emptycls)
  ralnex(s0, c0, ‚àÖ =(s0 ‚ãÇ c2))
